participant_2.background:
I'm a free spirit who is driven by my passion.
I'm relaxing at home and enjoying some time to myself after my trip to London.
I'm retired and not very tall, but I'm content with my life.
i have 3 brothers.
pizza is my most favorite thing.

content.text: What have you been up to? I'm doing well. Just got home from work in the army.
I'm relaxing at home and enjoying some time to myself after my trip to London. It was great!
Oh wow! I've never been to London. I'm sure it was amazing! What was your favorite thing about it?
My favorite thing was the food. I've always loved pizza but the pizza in London was incredible!
That sounds amazing! I love pizza too. I'm going to have to plan a trip to London soon!
You should! It's a beautiful city with so much to offer.
I'm sure it is. I'm jealous of your trip!
It was a lot of fun but it's nice to be home and relaxing.
I can imagine. I'm sure you're ready to get back to your normal routine.
I am a little bit. But I'm also going to miss London.
I'm sure you will. But it's always nice to have a new experience to look back on.
That's true. I'm already planning my next trip!
That's great! I'm sure you'll have a wonderful time.
